ch.tofind.commusica.core

Class ClientCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.tofind.commusica.core.ClientCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICore

    public class ClientCore
extends Object
implements ICore
    This class represents the client side of the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      ClientCore()
      Setup the core as a client.

      • PLAYLIST_UPDATE

        public String PLAYLIST_UPDATE(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Method invoked when the server sends a PLAYLIST_UPDATE command it has two purposes: -Update the client playlist if the server who sends the update is the one saved by the client -Update the available servers list of the client
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        An empty String.

      • SEND_FIRST_CONNECTION

        public String SEND_FIRST_CONNECTION(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Entry point to notify the server the client want to connect to it. It sends the NEW_ACTIVE_CLIENT command by Unicast to the server chosen.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        An empty String

      • SEND_TRACK_REQUEST

        public String SEND_TRACK_REQUEST(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Entry point to ask the server for a track request. This method does the first check to ensure the track is in a supported format and then send the command TRACK_REQUEST with all the information available about the track. It also setup the Unicast client for the time of the "transaction" since the UnicastCLient isn't set anywhere in the client.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        An empty String if the checks are good, the command END_OF_COMMUNICATION otherwise.

      • TRACK_ACCEPTED

        public String TRACK_ACCEPTED(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Method invoked when the server sends the TRACK_ACCEPTED command. It is in this method that the file is sent by Unicast after the command SENDING_TRACK was sent to the server to make it go into file reception mode.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        An empty String.

      • TRACK_REFUSED

        public String TRACK_REFUSED(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Method invoked when the server sends the TRACK_REFUSED command. It can happen if the track was already on the server or in the database.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        END_OF_COMMUNICATION command

      • TRACK_SAVED

        public String TRACK_SAVED(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Method invoked when the server sends the TRACK_SAVED command. It notify that the track was saved in the server side.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        END_OF_COMMUNICATION command

      • SEND_UPVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST

        public String SEND_UPVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Entry point to send the UPVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST command. It retrieves by the args the id of the Track to upvote and sends it to the server.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        UPVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST command with the track id

      • SEND_DOWNVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST

        public String SEND_DOWNVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST(ArrayList<Object> args)
        Entry point to send the DOWNVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST command. It retrieves by the args the id of the Track to downvote and sends it to the server.
        Parameters:
        args - Args of the command.
        Returns:
        DOWNVOTE_TRACK_REQUEST command with the track id
